Description: Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin seated with Child beneath a monument, Joseph beside a donkey at l, two angels kneeling at r, antiquities behind Oil paint
Curator's comments: The pale tonality of the drawing, with the oil paint in some areas almost transparent, is similar to works dated by Percy to the late 1640s, see A. Percy, exhib. cat., Philadelphia Museum of Art, 'Giovanni Benedetto Castiglione, Master Draughtsman of the Italian Baroque', 1971, nos. 15-17.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: John Barnard (L.1419, L.1420 verso)
